美國商人Rocco Commisso 已經抵達米蘭，準備完成收購意甲球會費倫天拿的擁有權，據報道，此次的交易金額約為2億歐元，如果最終如願成行，將結束Della Valle 兄弟17年費倫天拿的管理。Commisso到底收購費倫天拿後，會否因為更加有發展空間和曝光率，而加大投資力度，抑或會繼續美國商人的「本質」以利益為本的加工廠路向發展，令人感到憂慮。

#體嘢

Milan will join the figure of a sports director with Paolo Maldini, who today should officially say yes to the role of technical director. According to the Sportmediaset edition of Italia 1, Igli Tare della Lazio is the great goal. For the biancoceleste ds, Elliott is ready to guarantee a double engagement compared to what he receives in the capital. Tare hesitates, but Lotito raises the wall. Another profile leads to Riccardo Bigon, probably leaving Bologna. On this role, however, it is possible that a more detailed study will be needed in the coming days, without excluding possible surprises.


Il Milan affiancherà la figura di un direttore sportivo a Paolo Maldini, che oggi dovrebbe dire sì ufficialmente al ruolo di direttore tecnico. Secondo quanto riferisce l'edizione di Sportmediaset su Italia 1, Igli Tare della Lazio è il grande obiettivo. Per il ds biancoceleste, Elliott è pronto a garantire un ingaggio doppio rispetto a quanto percepisce nella capitale. Tare tentenna, ma Lotito alza il muro. Un altro profilo porta a Riccardo Bigon, probabilmente in uscita da Bologna. Su questo ruolo, però, è possibile che serva uno studio più approfondito nei prossimi giorni, senza escludere possibili sorprese.

Serie A giants AC Milan's transfer strategies will remain the same and will carry the influence of Leonardo, who will leave the club in the summer.

Our transfers correspondent Fabrizio Romano understands that Leonardo has been keen on leaving the rossoneri over the last few weeks and he has made a decision about the same. But his ideas about who the club should go after still linger about in the Milan corridors.

Leonardo wanted to revolutionize the Milan midfield and one prominent target was Gremio's Everton. There was an agreement in principle between the two clubs and Milan wanted to replicate another Paqueta-esque transfer.

The other player was Malcom of Barcelona. Leonardo had already met his agent and had agreed some terms about a possible move to the San Siro. Two operations though did not have any concrete developments but they were good targets. One was Jordan Veretout of Fiorentina, who is currently a target for Napoli.

These ideas have not escaped the minds of the Milan leadership and Paolo Maldini will keep them in mind for the summer transfer window.

Serie A giants AC Milan's transfer strategies will remain the same and will carry the influence of Leonardo, who will leave the club in the summer.

Our transfers correspondent Fabrizio Romano understands that Leonardo has been keen on leaving the rossoneri over the last few weeks and he has made a decision about the same. But his ideas about who the club should go after still linger about in the Milan corridors.

Leonardo wanted to revolutionize the Milan midfield and one prominent target was Gremio's Everton. There was an agreement in principle between the two clubs and Milan wanted to replicate another Paqueta-esque transfer.

The other player was Malcom of Barcelona. Leonardo had already met his agent and had agreed some terms about a possible move to the San Siro. Two operations though did not have any concrete developments but they were good targets. One was Jordan Veretout of Fiorentina, who is currently a target for Napoli.

These ideas have not escaped the minds of the Milan leadership and Paolo Maldini will keep them in mind for the summer transfer window.

Serie A giants AC Milan's transfer strategies will remain the same and will carry the influence of Leonardo, who will leave the club in the summer.

Our transfers correspondent Fabrizio Romano understands that Leonardo has been keen on leaving the rossoneri over the last few weeks and he has made a decision about the same. But his ideas about who the club should go after still linger about in the Milan corridors.

Leonardo wanted to revolutionize the Milan midfield and one prominent target was Gremio's Everton. There was an agreement in principle between the two clubs and Milan wanted to replicate another Paqueta-esque transfer.

The other player was Malcom of Barcelona. Leonardo had already met his agent and had agreed some terms about a possible move to the San Siro.

Two operations though did not have any concrete developments but they were good targets. One was Jordan Veretout of Fiorentina, who is currently a target for Napoli.

These ideas have not escaped the minds of the Milan leadership and Paolo Maldini will keep them in mind for the summer transfer window.
MN - Milan, proposto a Moncada un brasiliano del Botafogo

關於Leo離任的坊間傳聞，坊間傳聞，坊間傳聞（重要的事說三遍！！！）
以下內容全部轉自微博博主G————F（侵刪）

RadioRossonera的Prota則在為Mediaset寫的一篇專欄中提到……
Prota還說了一個有意思的事情：Gazidis選擇了終止與Leo的工作關係，而加圖索是早就打定主意要辭職的，哪怕打進歐冠。原因麼，說很多事情都留在了米蘭內洛和米蘭之家，但在說更衣室的時候括號裡提到了太多電話，干涉他的選擇… 等著當事人將來出書吧。

最近挺多人問米蘭球迷的老朋友GFI教授又說啥了沒，下面是5月3號晚上他參加的一場線****談節目裡說的。
……
競技方面只有馬隊確認留下，加圖索確認離任，Leo則依然在被評估。 Leo被Elliott質疑的主要原因不是轉會市場，而是在德比前在加圖索不知情的情況下直接告訴包括帕奎塔在內的一些球員應該在場上如何跑位。 Elliott認為這種越權的行為直接導致了米蘭之後的崩盤。
……值得注意的是，這都是近一個月前的內容，過去幾天教授都在控訴Gazidis怎麼可以讓Leo走怎麼能把米蘭當阿森納怎麼能把Leo之前談好的目標（包括米林[doge]）都否決等等，感覺情緒十分不穩定，如果馬隊也走估計得跳河…

另一方面，他說的內容裡有些是他Elliott方面消息源說的，有些是他根據這些內容自己猜的（比如Leo與加圖索的繼任人選），有些是他聽其他的消息源說的，不能一概而論。

最後，和之前一樣，就當聽個故事吧，媒體編得，野推也編得，別當真，等官宣吧。

法案是去年4月通過的：在外國居住至少兩年的意大利籍或外籍員工，在來到意大利工作的前5年中70%的收入將免稅，如果是在某些特定地區工作，免稅比例可達到90%。 5年之後，如果員工滿足特定的條件的話免稅期可以再延長5年。
法案將於2020年正式實行，但由於意大利對於在意大利居住的定義是在意大利生活多於183天，意味著今年夏天7月4號之後簽約的球員/教練不算2019年居住在意大利，可以從2020年開始享受免稅福利。

法案是去年4月通過的：在外國居住至少兩年的意大利籍或外籍員工，在來到意大利工作的前5年中70%的收入將免稅，如果是在某些特定地區工作，免稅比例可達到90%。 5年之後，如果員工滿足特定的條件的話免稅期可以再延長5年。
法案將於2020年正式實行，但由於意大利對於在意大利居住的定義是在意大利生活多於183天，意味著今年夏天7月4號之後簽約的球員/教練不算2019年居住在意大利，可以從2020年開始享受免稅福利。
